ComicInfo.Summary: Ryan Archer witnesses Karza's final confrontation with the last surviving Pharoid Priest only to find himself not in the past, but in his own future, where he himself will face Karza for one final battle. What is the secret purpose of the Time Traveler? And how does this fit into the larger story of the Micronauts, both past and present? All the secrets are revealed here in a story that will please Micronauts fans, both old and new!
